thread.title: ROSALIE TAYLORROBINSON
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by ROSALIE TAYLORROBINSON

author: ROSALIE TAYLORROBINSON
title: ROSALIE TAYLORROBINSON
text: I consistently have positive experiences when purchasing furniture, appliances, and electronics at Nebraska Furniture Mart. I have found them to be a better price point, and when I find it for less, they have honored or beat it. Love shopping with them when the need arises.
